name: Probability, YES!!!!
description:
Match 5 or more dice of the same number by rerolling them. It's more than just luck I promise.

Click + drag to select a number of tiles, then press the button to roll them.
You have a limited number of rolls that you can increase by destroying the shiny dice that appear when you make big matches.
At the start you can reroll 5 tiles at a time, but you can reroll more later on.

Post high scores in the comments if you want to!

Made in 48 hours for GMTK 2022

Works on mobile devices
